# focusedImage

**Instance Property**

The image to display when focus is on the button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var focusedImage: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If `focusedImage` is nil, the button uses [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPMapButton/image] as the default, creating a focused image using the alpha values from the image.

## Providing Button Images

- **image**: The image to display on the button.
